entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
